data.text: “Bende inyalo mako nyangʼ miluongo ni Leviathan41:1 Dho jo-Hibrania luongo lee-no ni Leviathan, ma ji paro ni en le malich machalo gi nyangʼ. gi olowu
Bende inyalo tucho ume mi isoe chuma
Bende nosik kokwayi ngʼwono?
Bende dotim kodi winjruok
Bende inyalo tugo kode ka winyo manie sigol,
Bende jo-ohala nyalo goyo nengone kata yangʼe
Bende inyalo tucho piene
Kapo ni imake gi lweti to nisik kiparo amendno
Bedo gi adiera ni inyalo loye en miriambo;
Onge ngʼato angʼata manyalo hedhore mar kwinye.
En ngʼa manyalo bandha gope moro ni nyaka achule?
“Ok abi weyo mak awuoyo kuom tiende nyangʼni,
En ngʼa manyalo dangʼo piende ma oko?
En ngʼa manyalo hedhore yawo dhoge,
Dier ngʼe nyangʼno
ka moro ka moro kochom kuom nyawadgi
Ochomgi motegno moro gi moro;
Kogir to ler pilore e dhoge
Mach makakni kaachiel
Iro dhwolore kawuok e ume mana ka iro mawuok
Muche moko mach maliel,
Ngʼute opongʼ gi teko mathoth;
Pien dende oriw motegno
Kore tek ka lwanda,
Nyasaye kochungʼ malo to joma roteke luoro mako;
Ligangla mochwoego ok time gimoro,
Chuma chalone lum
Aserni ok mi oringi;
Arungu oneno mana ka lum moro matin nono;
Laini manie bund iye bitho ka balatago motore,
Omiyo kut matut papni ka pi machwakore e dak
Oweyo yo moluwo karieny,
Onge gimoro amora e piny ngima minyalo pimo kode,
Ochayo le duto mokawore ni lich;
